unnormalised: The much-awaited India vs. Pakistan cricket match during the Asia Cup is scheduled for 02/09/2024 at 2:30 PM IST, according to sources. Fans across the country are already making plans, with many booking tickets and travel well in advance. The Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) confirmed the date yesterday, sending waves of excitement through social media.
normalised: the much awaited India versus Pakistan cricket match during the Asia Cup is scheduled for second September two thousand and twenty four at two thirty P-M I-S-T, according to sources. fans across the country are already making plans, with many booking tickets and travel well in advance. the Board of Control for Cricket in India (B-C-C-I) confirmed the date yesterday, sending waves of excitement through social media.

unnormalised: The final match of the Pro Kabaddi League (PKL) season 10 is set for 01/03/2025 at 8:00 PM, venue TBD. The league has seen a surge in popularity, and organizers are expecting a full house. Pre-sales for the final began on 15/12/2024, and reports indicate heavy demand. Many are anticipating seeing which teams will make it to the finale this season.
normalised: the final match of the Pro Kabaddi League (P-K-L) season ten is set for first March two thousand and twenty five at eight P-M, venue T-B-D. the league has seen a surge in popularity, and organizers are expecting a full house. pre-sales for the final began on fifteenth December two thousand and twenty four, and reports indicate heavy demand. many are anticipating seeing which teams will make it to the finale this season.

unnormalised: Lastly, the Mumbai Marathon 2025 is confirmed for 19/01/2025, starting at 5:30 AM. Registration details are available on the official website. With thousands expected to participate, traffic advisories will be issued closer to the date. This marks the 16th edition of the annual marathon.
normalised: lastly, the Mumbai Marathon two thousand and twenty five is confirmed for nineteenth January two thousand and twenty five, starting at five thirty A-M. registration details are available on the official website. with thousands expected to participate, traffic advisories will be issued closer to the date. this marks the sixteenth edition of the annual marathon.
